item.title: Monument Circle Acquisition Corp 10-K
item.description: Monument Circle Acquisition Corp, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 31, 2021 had 36228 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 1022 instances combination - 743 instances may - 585 instances initial - 559 instances shares - 450 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
